channel.title: Server Shutting Down At Random Times Help Please
channel.description: Hey guys, my server is pretty good but everynow and then it just shutsdown... i dunno why this is but people are complaining can i have some help of wat to do plz that would be great =)

item.title: Server Shutting Down At Random Times Help Please
item.dc:creator: @simf simf
item.description:
@simf wrote:

someone help me tho i was on moparscape and the thing said connection lost please wait…i waited and then it kicked me off and whenever i try to log back on it says someone is on that acc that i had?

Read full topic
item.source: Server Shutting Down At Random Times Help Please

its just a server crash,restart the server and it will be fine
